snippet: A Palestinian in the Gaza Strip, who died early Monday after being shot by Israeli forces as he approached the border fence with Israel, was mentally ill, his family said.
lead_paragraph: A Palestinian in the Gaza Strip, who died early Monday after being shot by Israeli forces as he approached the border fence with Israel, was mentally ill, his family said.

headline.seo: Gaza: Israeli Forces Kill Palestinian Man
headline.main: Gaza: Israeli Forces Kill Palestinian Man
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Israeli Forces Kill Palestinian Man
